Can you give me some data about sri krishna?

Lord Sri Krishna is a major deity in Hinduism and is considered the eighth avatar (incarnation) of Lord Vishnu. He is believed to have lived in the Dvapara Yuga, around 3200-3300 BCE. Krishna is revered as a divine prince, a spiritual guide, and a supreme being. He is known for his wisdom, courage, and divine love, as depicted in the Hindu epic, the Bhagavad Gita.
Can you give me some data about sri krishna?

Sri Krishna is often depicted as a blue-skinned god, holding a flute and wearing a crown of peacock feathers. He is said to have been born in Mathura, India, to Devaki and Vasudeva, and was raised by Yashoda and Nanda in Gokul. Krishna is known for his divine love for Radha, his friendship with Arjuna, and his role as a spiritual guide in the Bhagavad Gita.

Can you give me some data about narendra modi?

Narendra Modi is the 14th and current Prime Minister of India, serving since 2014. He was born on September 17, 1950, in Vadnagar, Gujarat, India. Modi is a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and was the Chief Minister of Gujarat from 2001 to 2014.

You want to know about Narendra Modi's life before 2014. Here's a brief overview:

Narendra Modi was born on September 17, 1950, in Vadnagar, Gujarat, India. He was the third of six children to Damodardas Modi and Hiraben Modi. Modi grew up in a lower-middle-class family and was involved in the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) from a young age. He completed his Bachelor's degree in Political Science from the University of Delhi. Modi became a pracharak (full-time worker) of the RSS in 1970 and later joined the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) in 1985. He rose through the ranks and became the General Secretary of the Gujarat unit of the BJP in 1987. In 2001, Modi became the Chief Minister of Gujarat, a position he held until 2014, when he was elected as the Prime Minister of India.
